dcterms:creator: A. G. Kurbis
B. Laschowski
A. Mihailidis
dcterms:description: The StairNet dataset contains over 515,000 RGB images that are manually annotated using hierarchical class labels for environments encountered during level-ground and stair locomotion. It is the largest and most diverse dataset of egocentric images of stair environments published to date.
dcterms:title: StairNet Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Laschowski
W. McNally
A. Wong
J. McPhee
dcterms:description: ExoNet is a database containing wearable camera images of human locomotion environments, which were captured using a chest-mounted wearable camera in various indoor and outdoor settings.
dcterms:title: ExoNet

dcterms:creator: K. Grauman
dcterms:description: Meta Ego4D is a dataset consisting of egocentric video footage collected from various environments, aimed at advancing the understanding of human activities and interactions in real-world settings.
dcterms:title: Meta Ego4D
